name: Covid Chase
description:
Controls:

WASD - movement

P - to add ammo "will be removed later"

Q - See behind the player/ 3rd person view

Space- jump

Covid Chase is a game I'm creating for my school project. Fight off Covid and get your revenge while you learn on the way.  I try to bring the effects that Covid had on our world into the game, the goal for this game is to be an educational game for anyone. At the moment it is a school safe game and a school-appropriate game. It is in the very early stages and updates will be released in the future. 

USE FULLSCREEN
